name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.
evolution_info: bulbasaur evolves into ivysaur via level 16. ivysaur evolves into venusaur via level 32
search_content: Name: Bulbasaur. Types: grass, poison. Stats: hp 45, attack 49, defense 49, special-attack 65, special-defense 65, speed 45. Description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON. Evolution: bulbasaur evolves into ivysaur via level 16. ivysaur evolves into venusaur via level 32
